text: Theodoros Christodoulou (Greek: Θεόδωρος Χριστοδούλου; born March 12, 1977) is a Cypriot alpine skier. He represented his country at the 2002 and 2006 Winter Olympics. == References == Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Alpine skiers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Alpine skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Cyprus Category:Cypriot male alpine skiers
title: Theodoros Christodoulou
